nodes.text: Quarris was a male Human criminal living during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. In 3642 BBY, Quarris worked for Rogun the Butcher and was in the group criminals were ordered to kill the Voidhound and bring his remains to the Crime lord. Quarris cornered the smuggler on Port Nowhere and brought Rogun in through the holotransmission, but was unable to best the Voidhound and was killed in the fight.
